Text: Can someone help me figure this out, I have a dsi and I loaded this on the sd card that goes in the side not the game slot, should this of worked or does it have to go in the game slot which is a different card?

@chop76

you have to purchase a flashcart r4i , m3i zero , DSST etc and put games on to there , will not work unless you have the right equipment , hope this helps
